channel.title: magnetic on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in magnetic on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-08
item.description: How Boston Dynamics Taught Its Robots to Dance (12 minute read) Last week, Boston Dynamics released a video of its robots dancing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-30
item.description: Apple Watch leak offers rare glimpse inside ‘Ultra security program’ (2 minute read) A video purporting to show an Apple Watch prototype has leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-02
item.description: Google Maps takes on Facebook with launch of its own news feed (3 minute read) Google Maps has introduced its own news feed feature.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.
